item.title: 12月被驱逐出国会的前众议员乔治-桑托斯（George Santos）已宣布将再次竞选众议员，但他所关注选区的共和党领导层表示对他 "没有兴趣"。
item.description:
Embattled former Rep. George Santos, who was expelled from Congress in December, has announced that he's once again running for the House — but GOP leadership in the district he's eyeing say there is "no appetite" for him. https://t.co/vRMQ2AZXJL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 英国一名法官已下令前总统特朗普向一家公司支付 38 万美元的律师费，该公司由 2016 年撰写臭名昭著的 "斯蒂尔档案 "的人经营。
item.description:
A judge in the U.K. has ordered former Pres. Trump to pay $380,000 in legal fees to a firm run by the man who penned the infamous "Steele Dossier" in 2016. https://t.co/U5HptQfaJ6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 拿骚县行政长官布鲁斯-布莱克曼（Bruce Blakeman）对纽约州总检察长莱蒂娅-詹姆斯（Letitia James）提起诉讼，因为她威胁要对该县最近的反变性体育禁令采取法律行动。
item.description:
Nassau County Executive Bruce Blakeman has filed a lawsuit against New York Attorney General Letitia James after she threatened legal action over the county's recent anti-transgender sports ban. https://t.co/HNqPW8kSPz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在这一天：十年前，马来西亚航空公司一架载有 239 人的波音 777 型飞机 MH370 消失了：
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: Ten years ago, Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370, a Boeing 777 with 239 people on board, vanished.

Read more: https://t.co/cGcsqjkIhm pic.twitter.com/2Fw6kFndYl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在民调显示选民不支持拜登总统或前总统特朗普的大选年，第三党和独立党的选择引起了一些人的注意。
item.description:
In an election year when polls show voters don't approve of either Pres. Biden or former Pres. Trump, third party and independent options are attracting notice from some. https://t.co/kwsrP5OidG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中提出了一系列针对现有和潜在房主的税收减免政策，旨在减轻房主的负担，刺激房地产市场：
item.description:
In his State of the Union address, Pres. Biden proposed a pair of tax credits for current and prospective homeowners meant to ease affordability and stimulate the housing market.

Here's what to know: https://t.co/pd3RhInccA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：参议院通过了六项拨款法案，以避免政府部分停摆。这些法案将在午夜截止日期前提交拜登签署成为法律：
item.description:
BREAKING: The Senate has passed six funding bills to avert a partial government shutdown. The bills now head to Biden's desk to be signed into law before the midnight deadline.

Read more: https://t.co/Rck30FPIlw pic.twitter.com/ZiyKvbyG39

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 欧洲联盟宣布启动 "塞浦路斯海上走廊"，这是一条由欧洲最东南岛屿塞浦路斯提供便利的海上航线，用于向加沙的巴勒斯坦人运送援助物资。
item.description:
The European Union announced the launch of the Cyprus Maritime Corridor, a naval route facilitated by Europe's most southeastern island, Cyprus, to deliver aid to Palestinians in Gaza. https://t.co/08b04K9el7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：参议院通过了六项拨款法案，以避免政府部分停摆。现在，这些法案将被送往拜登总统的办公桌。
item.description:
BREAKING: The Senate has passed six funding bills to avert a partial government shutdown. The bills now head to President Biden's desk. https://t.co/dDUPKvnTtv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）将继续担任 OpenAI 首席执行官，并重新加入公司董事会，公司董事会宣布，在对他去年临时下台一事进行 "广泛 "外部调查后，他将重新加入董事会。
item.description:
Sam Altman will remain as CEO of OpenAI and rejoin its board of directors following an "extensive" external investigation into his temporary ouster last year, the company's board announced. https://t.co/G0KVaPb3JZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 英格兰东南部一名 2 岁男孩的父亲分享了一段儿子举重时为他加油的视频，该视频在社交媒体上走红。
item.description:
A 2-year-old boy in southeast England has gone viral on social media after his father shared a video of his son cheering him on as he lifted weights.https://t.co/HhJY70CKdE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在美国和欧洲，越来越多的人支持扣押被冻结的俄罗斯银行资产以帮助乌克兰自卫和重建这一史无前例的想法。
item.description:
Support is building in the U.S. and in Europe for the unprecedented idea of seizing frozen Russian bank assets to help Ukraine defend and rebuild itself. https://t.co/SAf8MdZYtf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 西南航空正在以全新的面貌登机，重新设计的客舱拥有更大的行李箱空间、设备支架、电源插座和高级飞机座椅--但旅客们在注意到一个潜在的缺陷后，很快就对升级提出了批评。
item.description:
Southwest is onboarding a brand new look with re-designed cabins featuring larger bin space, device holders, power outlets, and premium aircraft seats — but travelers were quick to criticize the upgrades after noticing a potential flaw. https://t.co/0cYyMkdGx0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 一名 16 岁少年因在阿拉斯加西北部捕鲸村 Point Hope 开枪打死两人而被作为成年人起诉，他的公设辩护人为他做了无罪辩护。
item.description:
A 16-year-old teen charged as an adult in the shooting deaths of two people in the northwest Alaska whaling village of Point Hope had not guilty pleas entered for him by his public defender. https://t.co/RJ8V5Ek1Do

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：德克萨斯州公共安全部官员称，周五晚上一架直升机在美墨边境附近坠毁。
item.description:
JUST IN: A helicopter went down near the U.S.-Mexico border Friday evening, Texas Dept. of Public Safety officials say. https://t.co/mVRw40YEIX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 加拿大将恢复对联合国巴勒斯坦救济机构的资助，几周前，该机构因以色列指控其在加沙的一些工作人员而失去了数亿美元的资助。
item.description:
Canada will restore funding to the United Nations relief agency for Palestinians, weeks after the agency lost hundreds of millions of dollars in support following Israeli allegations against some of its staffers in Gaza. https://t.co/bOysVwQ7Lx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中提到一名被控杀害 22 岁护理专业学生拉肯-莱利（Laken Riley）的无证移民时使用了 "非法 "一词，这让一些民主党人和移民活动家感到失望。
item.description:
Pres. Biden disappointed some Democrats and immigration activists when he used the term "illegal" at the State of the Union when referring to an undocumented migrant accused of killing 22-year-old nursing student Laken Riley. https://t.co/M6dMeZHNB0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周日晚在洛杉矶举行的第 96 届奥斯卡金像奖颁奖典礼上，好莱坞的一些巨星将获得殊荣：
item.description:
Some of the biggest names in Hollywood will be honored at the 96th Academy Awards in Los Angeles on Sunday night.

Here's what you need to know ahead of the star-studded awards show: https://t.co/bQxNaigCA2 pic.twitter.com/CtYnZctEBY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 众议院立法者将于下周就一项可能在美国禁用 TikTok 的法案进行投票。@jayobtv 提供了更多关于该法案的信息，该法案将 "迫使 TikTok 从其中国母公司手中出售"。#就在此地就在此刻
item.description:
House lawmakers will vote on a bill next week that could ban TikTok in the U.S.@jayobtv has more on the legislation that would "force a sale of TikTok from its Chinese parent company." #RightHereRightNow pic.twitter.com/fUZwvo3BX8

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 8, 2024

item.title: 布里塔妮-德雷克塞尔 2009 年的失踪让她的家人惶恐不安了 13 年，也让全国人民陷入了悬念之中，因为调查人员一直在苦苦寻找这名高中女生。
item.description:
Brittanee Drexel's 2009 disappearance kept her family on edge for 13 years and kept the nation in suspense as investigators searched long and hard for the high school junior.

A new @ABC2020 episode looks at how investigators cracked the case. https://t.co/7DlByaBInM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 当日全食把白天变成黑夜时，动物的行为会有所不同吗？研究人员将于 4 月 8 日在得克萨斯州的沃斯堡动物园回答这个问题。
item.description:
When a total solar eclipse transforms day into night, do animals act differently?

Researchers will be standing by on April 8 to answer that very question at the Fort Worth Zoo in Texas. https://t.co/OwQquCCG5k pic.twitter.com/sRaTZ6ZmK5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 报告强调了几起事件，其中有人说出了真实的机密项目，但 "受访者错误地将这些真实的美国政府项目与外星人和外星活动联系起来"。
item.description:
The report highlights several incidents where individuals named authentic classified programs but "the interviewees mistakenly associated these authentic USG programs with alien and extraterrestrial activity." pic.twitter.com/wpBCMERpTF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中赞扬了美国的经济表现--但在提出在改善中产阶级前景的同时提高富人和公司税率的愿景时，他的语气仍然充满挑衅。
item.description:
Pres. Biden touted U.S. economic performance in his State of the Union Address — but still struck a defiant tone when setting forth a vision focused on hiking taxes for wealthy individuals and corporations while improving prospects for the middle class. https://t.co/OnDKPA2Ayq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统将前往战场宾夕法尼亚州，借助国情咨文的势头，拉开他竞选连任的序幕。
item.description:
Pres. Biden is heading to battleground Pennsylvania to build off his momentum from the State of the Union, kicking off a major ramp-up in his reelection campaign. https://t.co/yXu9NjRpZm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 共和党全国委员会主席罗娜-麦克丹尼尔（Ronna McDaniel）在休斯敦最后一次主持了党内会议，就在她辞去这一职务前不久--这为就唐纳德-特朗普批准的新领导层名单进行投票扫清了道路。
item.description:
Republican National Committee Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel gaveled in the party's meeting for the final time in Houston, shortly before she resigned from the role — clearing a path for a vote on the new, Donald Trump-approved slate of leadership. https://t.co/bXdfBhRlAl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 一名法官无限期推迟了州法院对四名被控在泰尔-尼科尔斯（Tyre Nichols）致命殴打案中犯有二级谋杀罪的前孟菲斯警官的审判，直到联邦法院对其侵犯公民权利的审判结束。
item.description:
A judge has indefinitely postponed the state court trial of four former Memphis officers charged with second-degree murder in the fatal beating of Tyre Nichols until after the conclusion of a federal court trial on civil rights violations. https://t.co/NiYROTJICf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 芝加哥卫生官员确认了该市自 2019 年以来的首例麻疹病例，而全美的感染人数也在不断上升。
item.description:
Chicago health officials have confirmed the city's first measles cases since 2019 amid a rising number of infections across the U.S. https://t.co/QwRqtbEL1Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

Embattled former Rep. George Santos, who was expelled from Congress in December, has announced that he's once again running for the House — but GOP leadership in the district he's eyeing say there is "no appetite" for him. https://t.co/rsZDPvjA2p

item.title: 新消息：哈马斯管理的加沙卫生部称，周五在加沙地带有五名儿童据称被来自一个不明身份的外国的人道主义援助空投炸死。
